title: Quick Chipotle-Orange Barbecue Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Quick Chipotle-Orange Barbecue Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
18
ounces
bottled
barbecue sauce
(
1 1/2
cups
), preferably Cattlemen’s
1/3
cup
orange juice
2
tablespoons
honey
1 1/2
teaspoons
finely chopped
chipotles in adobo
1/2
teaspoon
ancho chili powder
Directions
In a medium bowl, whisk together barbecue sauce, orange juice, honey, chipotles, and ancho chili powder. Use immediately or pour back in bottle and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
